name: INVASION.exe BETA v4.0
description:
This is my submission to the #BTPGameJam. You must play as an alien from the Xanara galaxy that has come to make his friends in the Milky-Way galaxy not suffer a fate that is pure torture. The sun will explode in approximately 10 minutes, so you should try to make minimal friends suffer their impending doom. This version was made in 6 days, and I hope you enjoy it! Thank you, and make sure to check out my Kickstarter page, or YouTube to support my game development, as a small indie developer! Thank you for checking out my submission! 

Controls: 

W - Forward

S - Revers

A - Roll Left

D - Roll Right

Q - Ascend

E - Descend

TAB - Skill Shop
